entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Snow over southern sections this morning. Amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
